meanings.sent1: The toy was missing from the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The cat went missing for a whole day.
meanings.sent3: I felt a bit silly when I realized my glasses were missing on top of my head.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a missing puzzle piece in the room.
meanings.sent5: The missing key to the treasure chest was hidden under the rug.

meanings.sent1: The recipe was missing a crucial ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The lost dog was missing for days.
meanings.sent3: The missing sock turned up in the refrigerator somehow.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a missing color in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The missing piece of the jigsaw puzzle was under the table all along.

meanings.definition: Feeling the lack or loss of something
meanings.sent1: She had a missing feeling in her heart after saying goodbye.
meanings.sent2: The child felt missing without their favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: I had a missing moment when I forgot my friend's birthday.
meanings.sent4: His absence was like a missing melody in the song.
meanings.sent5: The missing hug from her mom made her day feel incomplete.
